devdoc.details: A smart-contract which stores user's deposited collateral.

addCollateralBalance(uint256).details: Opterator collateral balance data. Only manager contract can modify database.

addNetBalance(uint256).details: The foundation operator want to add some coin to netbalance, which can increase the FPTCoin net worth.

params.amount: the amount of the settlement coin which the foundation operator want to transfer in this contract address.

addNetWorthBalance(int256).details: Opterator net worth balance data. Only manager contract can modify database.

addOperator(address).details: add a new operator by owner.

addTransactionFee(uint256,uint256).details: An interface for add transaction fee. Only manager contract can invoke this function.

params.feeType: transaction fee type. see TransactionFee contract

addUserInputCollateral(address,uint256).details: Opterator user input collateral data. Only manager contract can modify database.

params.user: input user account which need add input collateral.

addUserPayingUsd(address,uint256).details: Opterator user paying data, priced in USD. Only manager contract can modify database.

params.user: input user account which need add paying amount.

calSharedPayment().details: Calculate the collateral pool shared worth. The foundation operator will invoke this function frequently

getRealBalance().details: Retrieve the balance of collateral, the auxiliary function for the total collateral calculation.

getUserInputCollateral(address).details: Retrieve user's amount of the specified collateral.

getUserPayingUsd(address).details: Retrieve user's cost of collateral, priced in USD.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCollateralBalance(uint256).details: set collateral balance. Only manager contract can modify database.

setNetWorthBalance(int256).details: set net worth balance. Only manager contract can modify database.

setSharedPayment(int256,int256,uint256).details: Set the calculation results of the collateral pool shared worth. The foundation operator will invoke this function frequently

params.firstOption: The new first unexpired option's index.
params.sharedBalance: All unexpired options' shared balance distributed by time.

setUserInputCollateral(address,uint256).details: set user's collateral balance. Only manager contract can modify database.

setUserPayingUsd(address,uint256).details: set user paying data,priced in USD. Only manager contract can modify database.

subCollateralBalance(uint256).details: Substract collateral balance. Only manager contract can modify database.

subNetWorthBalance(int256).details: Substract net worth balance. Only manager contract can modify database.

subUserInputCollateral(address,uint256).details: Substract user's collateral balance. Only manager contract can modify database.

subUserPayingUsd(address,uint256).details: Substract user paying data,priced in USD. Only manager contract can modify database.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferPayback(address,uint256).details: Operation for transfer user's payback. Only manager contract can invoke this function.

transferPaybackAndFee(address,uint256,ui.details: Operation for transfer user's payback and deduct transaction fee. Only manager contract can invoke this function.

params.feeType: the transaction fee type. see transactionFee contract

devdoc.title: collateral pool contract with coin and necessary storage data.
